content.debug_report_desc_muted: A complete report of all status information of this Brick except passwords

content.factory_reset_modal_text: A factory reset will reset all configuration to their default values. This action cannot be undone! The Brick will re-open the WiFi access point with the default SSID and passphrase. Are you sure?

script.wrong_firmware_type: Firmware file does not match the type of this Brick

content.enable_mqtt_desc: This allows controlling the Brick over the configured MQTT broker. MQTT API documentation (german only)

content.ap_hide_ssid_desc_pre: Hides the network name. The Brick is reachable under the BSSID
